title: Merry Go Round of Life
lyrics: Tone I hope the stars, they light up the way. Cause in my eyes, it seems so far away.. And when the light goes, I will hold you so close (CFA)... Round and round like it's a Merry go round.. Now that we're dancing under the stars Promise tonight you'll give your heart a chance Cause when the light goes, I will hold you so close (DGB).. Round and round like it's a Merry go round...
